comment.author: 36330824621@N01
comment._content:
Gelocation tags are approximate. This building is definitely on the west side of the city fairly close to the wall (based on the view to the bay). Does anyone recognize the markings on top floor? 

Alguien reconoce este edificio? (quizas por las marcas en el ultimo piso)

comment.author: 7870082@N04
comment._content: That is the old El Mundo newspaper building.

comment.author: 36330824621@N01
comment._content: Awesome!! Thanks for the info, MGA66! [http://www.flickr.com/photos/MGA66/] This picture matches the pictures of the building on Oficina Estatal de Conservación Histórica. The register says the building's address is Calle San José #54 Viejo San Juan. Since the picture shows the San Juan Bay in the background, I'll estimate that the picture was taken from another tall building in the same block, but located on Calle Cruz. I updated the Geotags for this picture to point to the location of the subject (El Mundo newspaper building).
